Welcome to gbdx_tools’s documentation!¶

Contents:

Contains functions to interface with GBDX. For information on the GBDX API go to http://gbdxdocs.digitalglobe.com/.

gbdx_interface.rst modules.rst

gbdx_interface.check_order_status(sales_order_number, access_token)¶

Checks imagery order status.

Args:
sales_order_number (str): Sales order number. access_token (str): GBDX access token.
Returns:
str: ‘done’ if imagery has been ordered; ‘processing’ if not.
gbdx_interface.check_workflow_status(workflow_id, access_token)¶

Checks workflow status.

Args:
workflow_id (str): Workflow id. access_token (str): GBDX access token.
Returns:
str: Workflow status.
gbdx_interface.delete_in_s3(s3_bucket, s3_directory, access_token)¶

Delete all files within s3_bucket/s3_directory.

Args:
s3_bucket (str): User S3 bucket. s3_directory (str): S3 directory within bucket. It should not be preceded with nor followed by a backslash. local_directory (str): Local file location. access_token (str): GBDX access token.
gbdx_interface.download_from_s3(s3_bucket, s3_directory, local_directory, access_token)¶

Download files from s3_bucket/s3_directory.

Args:
s3_bucket (str): User S3 bucket. s3_directory (str): S3 directory within bucket. It should not be preceded with nor followed by a backslash. local_directory (str): Local file location. access_token (str): GBDX access token.
gbdx_interface.get_access_token()¶

Returns a GBDX access token.

gbdx_interface.get_catalog_ids(job)¶

Returns a list of image catalog ids specified in job.

Args:
job (dict): A dictionary corresponding to job.json. For the structure
of job.json look in README of this repo.
Returns:
list: list of image catalog ids.
gbdx_interface.get_location_of_ordered_imagery(sales_order_number, access_token)¶

Find location of ordered imagery.

Args:
sales_order_number (str): Sales order number. access_token (str): GBDX access token.
Returns:
str: Imagery location in S3.
gbdx_interface.has_this_been_ordered(image_catalog_id, access_token)¶

Checks if image has been ordered.

Args:
image_catalog_id (str): Image Catalog id in DG factory. access_token (str): GBDX access token.
Returns:
str: ‘True’ if image has been ordered; ‘False’ if not.
gbdx_interface.launch_workflow(workflow, access_token)¶

Launches GBDX workflow.

Args:
workflow (dict): Dictionary specifying workflow tasks. access_token (str): GBDX access token.
Returns:
str: Workflow id.
gbdx_interface.order_imagery(image_catalog_ids, access_token)¶

Orders images from GBDX.

Args:
image_catalog_ids (list): A list of image catalog ids. access_token (str): GBDX access token string.
Returns:
str: string containing the sales order number.
gbdx_interface.read_json(json_file)¶

Creates a dictionary from a json file.

Args:
json_file (str): A filename ending in .json.
Returns:
dict: Dictionary corresponding to json_file
gbdx_interface.set_params_aop_to_s3_workflow(aop_to_s3, input_images_location, output_images_location)¶

Set parameters for aop_to_s3 workflow.

Args:
aop_to_s3 (dict): Workflow dictionary. input_images_location (str): Imagery location on S3. output_images_location (str): Output imagery location on S3.
